name: layerimport

params.description: options for function call.
params.name: options

params.description: Specify if LayerImport control should be collapsed at startup. Default is true.
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: Specify if widget is draggable
params.name: options.draggable

params.description: data types that could be imported : "KML", "GPX", "GeoJSON", "WMS", "WMTS" and "MAPBOX". Values will be displayed in the same order in widget list.
params.name: options.layerTypes

params.description: Options to import WMS or WMTS layers
params.name: options.webServicesOptions

params.description: Proxy URL to avoid cross-domain problems. Mandatory to import WMS and WMTS layer.
params.name: options.webServicesOptions.proxyUrl

params.description: Proxy will not be used for this list of domain names. Only use if you know what you're doing.
params.name: options.webServicesOptions.noProxyDomains

params.description: Options for imported vector layer styling (KML, GPX, GeoJSON)
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions

params.description: Options for KML layer styling
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.KML

params.description: Extract styles from the KML. Default is true.
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.KML.extractStyles

params.description: Show names as labels for KML placemarks which contain points. Default is true.
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.KML.showPointNames

params.description: default style to be applied to KML imports in case no style is defined. defaultStyle is an {@link http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Style.html ol.style.Style} object.
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.KML.defaultStyle

params.description: Options for GPX layer styling
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.GPX

params.description: default style to be applied to GPX imports in case no style is defined. defaultStyle is an {@link http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Style.html ol.style.Style} object.
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.GPX.defaultStyle

params.description: Options for GeoJSON layer styling
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.GeoJSON

params.description: default style to be applied to GeoJSON imports in case no style is defined. defaultStyle is an {@link http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Style.html ol.style.Style} object.
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.GeoJSON.defaultStyle

params.description: Options for MapBox layer styling
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.MapBox

params.description: default style to be applied to MapBox imports in case no style is defined. defaultStyle is an {@link http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Style.html ol.style.Style} object.
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.MapBox.defaultStyle

params.description: options for tools editor
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.MapBox.editor

params.description: display tools editor
params.name: options.vectorStyleOptions.MapBox.display
